Product Development+Design+Exterior Desi.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of designs that receive approval from stakeholders.

Product Development+Design+Exterior Desi.KPIS: Time to Market for Exterior Designs
Product Development+Design+Exterior Desi.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time from the initial concept of exterior designs to market launch.
Product Development+Design+Exterior Desi.FORMULA: Total Time from Exterior Design Completion to Market Launch

Product Development+Design+Exterior Desi.EXPLANATION: Evaluates the quality of exterior designs based on various quality criteria.
Product Development+Design+Exterior Desi.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating of Exterior Designs

Product Development+Design+Exterior Desi.EXPLANATION: Measures how well actual costs for exterior design adhere to budgeted costs.
Product Development+Design+Exterior Desi.FORMULA: (Actual Cost for Exterior Design / Budgeted Cost for Exterior Design) * 100

Product Development+Design+Exterior Desi.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score for exterior designs.
Product Development+Design+Exterior Desi.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Feedback Ratings on Exterior Design / Number of Customers)

Product Development+Design+Exterior Desi.EXPLANATION: Assesses the level of innovation in exterior designs.
Measures the number of iterations a design undergoes before final approval.
Measures the efficiency of material usage in design processes.
